head.title: Transforming documents with OpenAPI pipelines
head.subtitle: Limits are for quitters

author.name: Ashley Noel Hinton
author.affiliation: Department of Statistics, The University of Auckland

head.description: Technical report on transforming documents using an OpenAPI pipeline.

body.p: This sections is unnumbered, which means it won't show up in a table of contents.
The transformable document pipeline is based around an XML document with document as the root node. This document has two child elements: head and body.
The head node contains the document metadata, with nodes for the document title and subtitle, author information, date of publication, and a description section.
